name: BattleBand
description:
BattleBand is a unique combination of rhythm games and RPGs with an (un)healthy dose of weirdness mixed in. It combines old-school J-RPGs and rhythm game inputs in its innovative Beat-Time Battle System.

This is an early demo build, meaning this is still in development and many things are still subject to change. All feedback and comments are more than welcome!

READ BEFORE PLAYING
This game works much better using headphones and a controller. Plug in a controller before playing, as automatic controller detection is not implemented yet.
